main.name: Fardin Safikhani
main.description: I am a software developer and I use javascript/react to develop pages, as well as Unity and C# to create Games. This website will be a place to host my future projects and hopefully catch the eyes of employers
main.bio: I am a proud worker and I enjoy working on projects that have passion in them. During my time at school I have learned a lot about data structures and the tools to make applications. I always made sure to keep my skills topped off over the years by working on personal projects. Some of the skills ive prided myself on are: Javascript, Python, C#, and Java, I have used these languages consistently throughout the years and Im sure given enough time I can learn even more about them.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to drop your email and get in touch ill get to you ASAP

education.description: Went to york and learned a lot about data structures and the actual makeup of the software we use day to day. York

work.title: Crew Trainer
work.description: McDonalds has taught me a lot of skills including teamwork and general responsibility, from arriving to work early and prepping my station to having a strong grasp on all my duties so I can teach others who are still learning their work.
